original_text: Then Jeremiah came from Topheth, where the Lord had sent him to prophesy, and he stood in the court of the Lord's house and said to all the people:
korean_text: 예레미야가 여호와께서 자기를 보내사 예언하게 하신 도벳에서 돌아와 여호와의 집 뜰에 서서 모든 백성에게 말하되

sentences.original_text: where the Lord had sent him to prophesy
and he stood in the court of the Lord's house
and said to all the people:
